This is comedically atrocious CGI, even for 2007 standards. And the ending was not good.

But overall, still a very intense and beautifully-performed film with some serious emotional moments.

In and of itself this film is fine. It has plenty of thrills, a solid central performance and some stunning set pieces. Nothing wrong with that. It makes for some enertaining sci-fi/horror shenanigans.
